p: Viral load testing was performed on Munktell DBS using the COBAS AmpliPrep for sample preparation and COBAS TaqMan HIV‐1 2.0 test (Roche Applied Science, Pleasanton CA, USA; lower limit of quantification 400 copies/mL for DBS) 16. We utilize a conservative viral suppression cut off of <5000 copies/mL, which is a higher threshold than recommended for plasma due to the combined quantification of both proviral DNA (present in settings of viral RNA suppression) and cellular RNA in DBS samples 17.
